name: College Kings
description:
Join the community





Just an innocent freshman at San Vallejo College, you are oblivious to the path that lays ahead of you. Growing up gets real when you learn about the unique cultures of the place you must call home. As loyalties form and tensions rise can you lead your fraternity to the crown and with it become the king on campus?



College Kings allows you to live the college experience however you want. Make meaningful choices that will alter the course of your time at San Vallejo. Your decisions will influence your 3 Key Character Traits: Confident, Popular & Loyal. These traits will change how those around you will perceive you and the opportunities that are presented.



A unique and immersive fighting mode combines gripping story with challenging gameplay truly making the game feel alive. The achievements are much more rewarding, but the failures will leave you with dirt on your face. And with a handpicked soundtrack for every single moment, get ready to be immersed in the world of College Kings.

Features

  • Creative fighting experience offers a tough yet rewarding challenge.
  • Active pathing from player choices will decide your story.
  • Detailed character personality system changes how the world around you unfolds.
  • Scene selector to relive your favourite moments.
  • Interactive sex scenes put you in control.
  • Real life mode forces you to live with your choices.
